name: German Meatballs
ingredients: 1 pound ground chuck or leaner ground beef
1 pound pork sausage, or another pound of ground beef
1/2 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese, 2 ounces
Salt and Spicy Seasoning Salt, to taste
Water, as needed to thin the sauce

instructions.en: Mix meatball ingredients in a large bowl. Form into about 35 golf ball-sized meatballs.
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte prísady na mäsové guľky vo veľkej miske. Vytvarujte asi 35 guľôčok veľkosti golfovej loptičky.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルでミートボールの材料を混ぜます。ゴルフボール大のミートボールを約35個作ります。

instructions.en: Bake meatballs at 375°F for 15-20 minutes until cooked through. Rinse in colander if necessary.
instructions.sk: Pečte mäsové guľky pri 190°C 15-20 minút, kým nie sú prepečené. V prípade potreby opláchnite v cedidle.
instructions.ja: 375°F（190°C）のオーブンで15〜20分、中まで火が通るまで焼きます。必要に応じてザルですすぎます。

instructions.en: Sauté mushrooms in butter until tender; set aside.
instructions.sk: Opečte huby na masle do mäkka; odložte bokom.
instructions.ja: バターでマッシュルームを柔らかくなるまで炒めます。取り置きます。

instructions.en: Melt cream cheese in pot, whisk in cream, parmesan, and seasonings. Add water to thin if needed.
instructions.sk: Roztopte krémový syr v hrnci, vmiešajte smotanu, parmezán a korenie. V prípade potreby pridajte vodu na zriedenie.
instructions.ja: 鍋でクリームチーズを溶かし、生クリーム、パルメザン、調味料を泡立て器で混ぜます。必要に応じて水で薄めます。

instructions.en: Optionally add xanthan gum to thicken sauce. Adjust seasoning.
instructions.sk: Voliteľne pridajte xantánovú gumu na zahustenie omáčky. Upravte ochutenie.
instructions.ja: 必要に応じてキサンタンガムを加えてソースを濃くします。味を調整します。

instructions.en: Add meatballs and mushrooms to sauce. Simmer on low heat for 20-30 minutes until heated through.
instructions.sk: Pridajte mäsové guľky a huby do omáčky. Varte na miernom ohni 20-30 minút, kým sa neprehreje.
instructions.ja: ソースにミートボールとマッシュルームを加えます。弱火で20〜30分、熱が通るまで煮込みます。

notes: Makes about 8 servings of 4-5 meatballs each. The meatballs can be frozen, but not the sauce.

nutritionalInformation.amount: Per serving (with half beef, half pork)
